title: Learn More: Spring Split Finals Missions

replies.body: A real shame you can only get your own regions icon
Yeah I don't know why it's limited to that...

No matter how many times I watch the VODS, the mission is not completed.

The line "Watch rewards are correctly set up for your account" is not shown when I watch OPL VODS

Other regions seem fine and I can still do my watch&earn missions.

What should I do???

They can be a bit finicky for sure.

Just to be sure, you are watching the OPL *finals* VODs yes? Only those final 3 games count for the mission.

At any rate, there are a few things you can try:
- Sometimes it just takes time to update, and waiting can be enough. 
- You can try a different browser, some people seem to have better luck with different browsers.
- You can try a different viewing mode. Try putting it in fullscreen and see if that helps (obvs having multiple monitors is a plus here).

Failing all that, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They might be able to give you some other tip to get it to register, or may be able to manually update it. I don't know how this stuff works on their end, but they can likely at least point you in the right direction.
There are no VODS available for OPL, is there any way to watch the vods to gain the rewards for oce?
but, you need the VODs to be there to watch if you missed it .... I want the OCE VODs up (seen the others, but they don't count)
you sound like a wonderful human being... I would take this comment down people like ripping wonderful people to pieces. glhf
lol? im not bashing anyone, the icon is shit. and OCE is the worst region inm terms of skill on the international stage.

Incorrect. OCE has come last in only one Riot run international event, two events if you count IEM Taipei in which they attended with a different roster than that which qualified for the event anyway.
Even so, it doesn't hurt anyone to support your region's teams through it all, or at least not put them down.

OCE without esports is not a future anyone should want to be a part of creating.
the games between order and bombers right???
